## saber fs

File system

### Synopsis

The file system can browse your directory

```
saber fs [flags]
```

### Examples

```
saber fs /data/logs/ --port 7000
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help       help for fs
      --port int   port number (default 7000)
```

```
  -d, --debug   print verbose log info
```
